message: Let's be fair, Bob. I propose a 55/45 split in my favor to start.  It benefits us both to settle quickly and avoid inflation eating away at our potential gains.
I think a 52.5/47.5 split is more equitable. We can avoid further inflation by agreeing now.
Bob, time is running out and inflation is hurting us both.  I'm coming down to 51/49 - let's close this deal and avoid losing even more.
